title: "Adults who, as children, had half their brain removed still able to score well with face and word recognition"
excerpt: "A team of researchers at Carnegie Mellon University's Department of Psychology and Neuroscience Institute has found that adults who had a hemispherectomy as a child scored surprisingly well on face and word recognition tests."
